headline: How Does Masco’s (MAS) Resilient Profitability Shape Its Capital Allocation Playbook?
summary: In late July 2025, Masco Corporation reported second-quarter results showing sales of US$2.05 billion and net income of US$270 million, alongside a quarterly dividend declaration of US$0.31 per share, an ongoing share buyback program, and updated full-year guidance anticipating sales to be flat and adjusted net income per share between US$3.87 and US$4.07. An interesting detail is that despite sales being slightly lower than the prior year, Masco increased its net income and continued...
